<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;

</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	NOTE 1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	&#x2014;FAIR VALUE MEASUREMENTS
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:4.5PT 0PT 0PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	We used the following methods and significant assumptions to estimate fair value for assets and liabilities recorded at fair value.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:9PT 0PT 0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Foreign Exchange Forward
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	and Option
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Contracts
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	: &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Foreign exchange forward contracts are reported at fair value utilizing Level 2 inputs, as the fair value is based on broker quotes for the same or similar derivative instruments.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The fair value of foreign exchange forward contracts rec
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	orded in our balance sheets was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	million at December 31, 2016 and 2015.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Goodwill and Other Intangible Assets:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Goodwill and other intangible assets are subject to annual impairment testing, which requires a significant degree of management judgment.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the testing results in impairment, we would
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	measure
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	goodwill and other intangible assets
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	using
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	level 3 non-recurring
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	inputs
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;As of December 31, 2015, we recorded impairment charges to both goodwill and other intangible assets; therefore, these assets were classified
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	level 3 non-recurring fair value measurement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	With the exception of long-term debt, the fair values of our financial instruments, including cash and cash equivalents, accounts receivable, trade accounts payable and accrued liabilities approximate carrying value. The carrying value of our debt was

<P STYLE="MARGIN:13.5PT 0PT 0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	NOTE 16&#x2014;COMMITMENTS AND CONTINGENCIES
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:4.5PT 0PT 0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Leases
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:4.5PT 0PT 0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	We regularly enter into operating and capital lease arrangements for certain of our facilities and equipment. Our leases are renewable at our option for various periods through 2031. Certain renewal options are subject to escalation clauses and contain clauses for payment of real estate taxes, maintenance, insurance and certain other operating expenses of the properties. Leases with escalation clauses based on an index, such as the consumer price index, are expensed based on current rates. Leases with specified escalation steps are expensed and projected based on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	the total lease obligation ratably over the life of the lease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. We amortize leasehold
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>

</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:13.75PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Legal Proceedings
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Asbestos Claims.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp; We are one of many defendants in lawsuits that plaintiffs have brought seeking damages for personal injuries that exposure to asbestos allegedly caused. Plaintiffs and their family members have brought these lawsuits against a large volume of defendant entities as a result of the various defendants&#x2019; manufacture, distribution, supply or other involvement with asbestos, asbestos-containing products or equipment or activities that allegedly caused plaintiffs to be exposed to asbestos. These plaintiffs typically assert exposure to asbestos as a consequence of third-party manufactured products that the Company&#x2019;s subsidiary, MRC Global (US) Inc., purportedly dist
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ributed. As of December&nbsp;31, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, we are a named defendant in approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	510
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	lawsuits involving approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	130
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	claims.&nbsp;&nbsp;No asbestos lawsuit has resulted in a judgment against us to date, with the majority being settled, dismissed or otherwise resolved. Applicable third-party insurance has substantially covered these claims, and insurance should continue to cover a substantial majority of existing and anticipated future claims. Accordingly, we have recorded a liability for our estimate of the most likely settlement of asserted claims and a related receivable from insurers for our estimated recovery, to the extent we believe that the amounts of recovery are probable.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	We annually conduct analyses of our asbestos-related litigation to estimate the adequacy of the reserve for pending and probable asbestos-related claims. Given these estimated reserves and existing insurance coverage that has been available to cover substantial portions of these claims, we believe that our current accruals and associated estimates relating to pending and probable asbestos-related litigation likely to be asserted over the next
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	15
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	years are currently adequate. This belief, however, relies on a number of assumptions, including:&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:18PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:18PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 17.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;WIDTH:1PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	That our future settlement payments, disease mix and dismissal rates will be materially consistent with historic experience;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:18PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:18PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 17.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;WIDTH:1PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	That future incidences of asbestos-related diseases in the U.S.&nbsp;will be materially consistent with current public health estimates;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	That there are no materially negative developments in the claims pending against us; and
</FONT>
</P>

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH:18PT;">

</P>

<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;

</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	That key co-defendants in current and future claims remain solvent.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	If any of these assumptions prove to be materially different in light of future developments, liabilities related to asbestos-related litigation may be materially different than amounts accrued or estimated. Further, while we anticipate that additional claims will be filed in the future, we are unable to predict with any certainty the number, timing and magnitude of such future claims. In our opinion, there are no pending legal proceedings that are likely to have a material adverse effect on our consolidated financial statements.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:9PT 0PT 0PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Other Legal Claims and Proceedings.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	From time to time, we have been subject to various claims and involved in legal proceedings incidental to the nature of our businesses. We maintain insurance coverage to reduce financial risk associated with certain of these claims and proceedings. It is not possible to predict the outcome of these claims and proceedings. However,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	in our opinion,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	there are no pending legal proceedings that are likely to have a material adverse effect on our consolidated financial statements
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:9PT 0PT 0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	F-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	30
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage90"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:9PT 0PT 0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Product Claims.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	From time to time, in the ordinary course of our business, our customers may claim that the products we distribute are either defective or require repair or replacement under warranties that either we or the manufacturer may provide to the customer. These proceedings are, in the opinion of management, ordinary and routine matters incidental to our normal business. Our purchase orders with our suppliers generally require the manufacturer to indemnify us against any product liability claims, leaving the manufacturer ultimately responsible for these claims. In many cases, state, provincial or foreign law provides protection to distributors for these sorts of claims, shifting the responsibility to the manufacturer. In some cases, we could be required to repair or replace the products for the benefit of our customer and seek our recovery from the manufacturer for our expense.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In our opinion, the likelihood that the ultimate disposition of any of these claims and legal proceedings would have a material adverse effect on our consolidated financial statements is remote.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Weatherford Claim.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In addition to PVF, our Canadian subsidiary, Midfield Supply (&#x201C;Midfield&#x201D;), now known as MRC Canada, also distributed progressive cavity pumps and related equipment (&#x201C;PCPs&#x201D;) under a distribution agreement with Weatherford Canada Partnership (&#x201C;Weatherford&#x201D;) within a certain geographical area located in southern Alberta, Canada.&nbsp;&nbsp;Commencing in late 2005 and into early 2006, Midfield hired new employees, including individuals who left Weatherford, as part of Midfield&#x2019;s desire to expand its PVF business into northern Alberta.&nbsp;&nbsp;Shortly thereafter, many of these employees left Midfield and formed a PCP manufacturing, distribution and service company named Europump Systems Inc. (&#x201C;Europump&#x201D;) in 2006.&nbsp;&nbsp;The distribution agreement with Weatherford expired in 2006.&nbsp;&nbsp;Midfield supplied Europump with PVF products that Europump distributed along with sales of PCP pumps.&nbsp;&nbsp;In April 2007, Midfield purchased Europump&#x2019;s distribution branches and began distributing and servicing Europump PCPs.&nbsp;&nbsp;In 2014, the Company divested its PCP business to Europump, which Halliburton Corporation subsequently purchased.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Pursuant to a complaint that Weatherford filed on April 11, 2006 in the Court of Queen&#x2019;s Bench of Alberta, Judicial Bench of Edmonton (Action No. 060304628), Weatherford sued Europump, three of Europump&#x2019;s part suppliers, Midfield, certain current and former employees of Midfield, as well as other entities related to these parties, asserting a host of claims including breach of contract, breach of fiduciary duty, misappropriation of confidential information related to the PCPs, unlawful interference with economic relations and conspiracy.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company denies these allegations and contends that Midfield&#x2019;s expansion and subsequent growth was the result of fair competition.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	From 2006 through 2012, the case focused largely on Weatherford&#x2019;s questioning of defense witnesses.&nbsp;&nbsp;In 2013, the defendants began substantive questioning of Weatherford and its witnesses.&nbsp;&nbsp;Discovery is ongoing and expected
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	through early 2017
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In April 2016, the court dismissed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	two
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	suppliers from the case.&nbsp;&nbsp;Weatherford has appealed this dismissal.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The case is scheduled for trial in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	March 2018.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	While the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	believes Weatherford&#x2019;s claims are
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	without merit and we intend to defend against them vigorously, in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	November 2015, the Company filed with the Court a formal offer of settlement for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	million plus one half of the Weatherford party&#x2019;s costs and interest under the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Judgment Interest
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Act
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Weatherford declined to accept the offer.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	As of December 31, 2016 and 2015, the Company had recorded a reserve
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#x2008;million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	associated with this claim.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Customer Contracts
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:4.5PT 0PT 0PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	We have contracts and agreements with many of our customers that dictate certain terms of our sales arrangements (pricing, deliverables, etc.). While we make every effort to abide by the terms of these contracts, certain provisions are complex and often subject to varying interpretations. Under the terms of these contracts, our customers have the right to audit our adherence to the contract terms. Historically, any settlements that have resulted from these customer audits have been immaterial to our consolidated financial statements.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Letters of Credit
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:4.5PT 0PT 0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Our letters of credit outstanding at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	December 31, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	approximated
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	52
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	million.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Bank Guarantees
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:4.5PT 0PT 0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Certain of our international subsidiaries have trade guarantees that banks have issued on their behalf. The amount of these guarantees at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	December 31, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	was approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	million.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Purchase Commitments
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:4.5PT 0PT 0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	We have purchase obligations consisting primarily of inventory purchases made in the normal course of business to meet operating needs. While our vendors often allow us to cancel these purchase orders without penalty, in certain cases, cancellations may subject us to cancellation fees or penalties depending on the terms of the contract.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<A NAME="eolPage91"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">

</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Warranty Claims
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:4.5PT 0PT 0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	We are involved from time to time in various warranty claims, which arise in the ordinary course of business. Historically, any settlements that have resulted from these warranty claims have been immaterial to our consolidated financial statements.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:4.5PT 0PT 0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	NOTE
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	17
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;">
	&#x2014;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	RESTRUCTURING
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In August 2016, we announced a plan to restructure and downsize our Australian operations in response to the continued downturn in the oil and gas and mining industries in the region.&nbsp;&nbsp;As a result of this plan, we
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	incurred
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	million of charges
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, including $10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	million of inventory-related charges
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, $4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	million of lease termination
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and property
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	costs
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	million of employee severance, and $1 million of other relocation costs.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	These charges included $7 million of cash costs.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In the statement of operations, inventory-related charges are reflected in cost of sales while all other costs are reflected in selling, general and administrative expe
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	nses.&nbsp;&nbsp;The restructuring plan was substantially completed in the fourth quarter of 2016.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_59"></A>

<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:UPPERCASE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;;">

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">

<TR>

</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;;;PADDING:0PT 22PT 0PT 0PT;">
	2.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Performance Share Unit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Generally
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	. Each
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Performance Share Unit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	represents a contractual right to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	earn
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	one S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	hare
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	under
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the terms and conditions of this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	T
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	he number of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Shares
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	that the Participant earns
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	shall be determined based on the extent to which the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Company achieves the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	applicable performance goals
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	set forth
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	in this Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The Participant&#x2019;s right to earn
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	up to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	50%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Performance Share Unit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	at Target
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	is determined under
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	provisions of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Section
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Relative TSR
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Performance Share Unit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and the Participant&#x2019;s right to earn
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	up to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the remaining
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	50%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Performance Share Unit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	at Target
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	is determined under Section&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	RANCE
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Performance Share Unit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Participant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;s right to receive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Shares
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	in respect of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	a &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Performance Share Unit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	is generally contingent, in whole or in part, upon
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Participant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;s continued employment with the Company or one of its Subsidiaries
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(collectivel
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	y, the Company with all of its S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ubsidiaries, the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Company Group
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	through the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Last Day of the Performance Period
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	except as provided in Section&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;;;PADDING:0PT 22PT 0PT 0PT;">
	2.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Dividend Equivalents
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	. With respect to each outstanding
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Performance Share Unit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, the Company shall credit a book entry account with an amount equal to the amount of any cash dividend paid on one
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Share that could be earned under the Performance Share Unit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	during the Performance Period
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	. The amount credited to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	book entry account shall be payable to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the
</FONT>
</P>
<P>

</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ranking of the Company within that order may be determined (references to rank
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	in this Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	are determined from the lowest return so that, for example, the 35
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:6PT;VERTICAL-ALIGN:SUPER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%">
	th
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	percentile is the 35
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:6PT;VERTICAL-ALIGN:SUPER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%">
	th

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	percentile from the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	lowest

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	TSR
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	of the companies in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	OSX I
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ndex
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	).

<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;;;PADDING:0PT 22PT 0PT 0PT;">
	3.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Average
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Share
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Price
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	means
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	average of the closing prices of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	a Share
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	a share or other
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	equity
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	unit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	of each other relevant company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	on each trading day in the 20
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	trading
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	day period ending on and including the applicable date of determination.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Dividends per share paid other than in the form of cash shall have a value equal to the amount of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	dividends
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	or other relevant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	company reports
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	to its shareholders
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	or equity holders for purposes of U.S. f
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ederal income taxation.

</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;;;PADDING:0PT 22PT 0PT 0PT;">
	3.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	OSX Index
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	means the Philadelphia Oil Service Sector Index (or its successor index or, if the Philadelphia Oil Service Sector Index is discontinued, a comparable index or group of companies that the Committee determines
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	is an appropriate comparator group
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">

<BR />
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	*
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	For any amounts
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	calculated under this Section 4 that fall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	between two
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	percentages set forth in the left column above that are between
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	percentage of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	number of Shares that the Participant earns under the RANCE Performance Share Unit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	s &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	shall be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	interpolated in a straight line between the two
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	relevant percentages
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	If the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	has no
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	positive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Net I
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ncome
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	for the Performance Period
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	then the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Participant&#x2019;s rights to earn any RANCE
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Performance Share Unit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	shall lapse and be forfeited
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	on the Last Day of the Performance Period.
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;;;PADDING:0PT 22PT 0PT 0PT;">
	4.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Net Income
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	mean
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the Company&#x2019;s net income
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	in accordance with U.S. generally accepted accounting principles
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	GAAP
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.

</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">

<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage95"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;;;PADDING:0PT 22PT 0PT 0PT;">
	4.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	RANCE
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	mean
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the Company&#x2019;s cumulative NOPAT for the Performance Period divided by the Company&#x2019;s Average NCE, which quotient is then divided by 3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(or such other appropriate divisor if necessary pursuant to Section 5)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;;;PADDING:0PT 22PT 0PT 0PT;">
	4.3

	Share
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s with respect to the Performance Period that the Participant would have
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	been
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">

<A NAME="eolPage96"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	actually awarded
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	had the Participant not Terminated employment wit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	h the Company and its S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ubsidiaries.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Termination described in

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	clause
</FONT>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	of

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	this S
</FONT>

	ection
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;

	5.3

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	shall be referred to as a &#x201C;

	Retirement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x201D;

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	for the purposes of this Agreement

	.&nbsp;&nbsp;

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Notwithstanding the

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	foregoing

	5.3

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	to have effect, the following must be satisfied:

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(A)
</FONT>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the Participant must remain employ
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ed with the Company on or after
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	first
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	anniversary of the
</FONT>

	Grant Date

	unless the Committee waives this requirement,

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">

	(B)

	Participant and the Company ha

	entered into an employment agreement

	&nbsp;

	that provides for continued vesting of a long-term equity award after

	each as defined in the Participant&#x2019;s employment agreement

	terms of the

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	h
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">

</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;;;PADDING:0PT 22PT 0PT 0PT;">
	6.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Form of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Conversion and Settlement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	All
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	payments in respect of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	e
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	arned
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Performance Share Unit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s shall be made in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Shares
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	unless the Board or the Committee determines Shares are not available for payment, in which case payment shall be made in cash based on the Fair Market Value of the Shares on the date that payment is required
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Certificates or evidence of book-entry shares representing a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ny
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Shares
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Participant has
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	earned pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	this Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	shall be delivered to
</FONT>
<A NAME="MRC-20161231XEX10_1214_HTM__REF405886858">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Participant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(or, at the discretion of the Participant, jointly in the names of the Participant and the Participant&#x2019;s spouse)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, the Participant&#x2019;s beneficiary
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	or estate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, if applicable,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the Participant&#x2019;s nominee
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Any fractional
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	e
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	arned
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Shares
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	shall be rounded down to the nearest whole
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Share
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>

</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;;;PADDING:0PT 22PT 0PT 0PT;">
	6.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Effect of Conversion and Settlement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Upon conversion into
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Shares
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, all of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Participant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Performance Share Unit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s shall be cancelled and terminated.&nbsp;&nbsp;If and to the extent that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Participant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	is still employed at the end of the Performance Period, and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Participant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	has not earned Shares under the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Performance Share Unit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s in accordance with the terms of this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, all such
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Performance Share Unit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s shall be cancelled and terminated.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>

<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:UPPERCASE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;;">
	7.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Forfeiture
</FONT>
</P>

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;;;PADDING:0PT 22PT 0PT 0PT;">
	7.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Termination of Employment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Any portion of the Award that has not vested
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	or otherwise has been earned
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	as of the day following the date of the Participant&#x2019;s Termination for any reason other than Retirement, death or Disability or under Section 5.4 shall be forfeited upon the Termination, and all Shares
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	that may have been issued under the Award that were not earned shall be treated as the terms of the Plan provide
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;;;PADDING:0PT 22PT 0PT 0PT;">
	7.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Retirement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	or Termination without Cause
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	or for Good Reason
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	In the case of a Termination by reason of Retirement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	if the Participant engages in any Prohibited Activity (as defined in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Exhibit A
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	) &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	prior to the date of payment of any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	vested or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	e
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	arned
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Shares under
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Performance Share Units, any portion of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Award
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	that has not been earned, issued
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	or delivered
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	may, in the sole discretion of the Committee
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	immediately cancelled; and, in that case,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	all
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Shares
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	that have
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	not
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	been issued or delivered shall be forfeited
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	cancelled and terminate without payment of any consideration therefor.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	If the Company receives an allegation of a Prohibited Activity, the Company, in its
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	sole
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	discretion, may suspend the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	payment of any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Award
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	for up to three months to permit the investigation of the allegation. If the Company determines that the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Participant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	did not engage in any Prohibited Activities, the Company shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	deliver any Shares that would have otherwise
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	been earned
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	but for the suspension.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>

<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:UPPERCASE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;;">
	8.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Restrictive Covenant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;I
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	n consideration of the Award
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Participant agrees not to engage in Prohibited Activity during Participant&#x2019;s employment with the Company Group and for a period of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[CEO
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	or President
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	: &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	24][EVPs: 18
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	][
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	SVPs
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	: &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	12
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	months after Participant&#x2019;s T
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ermination of employment with the Company Group (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Restricted Period
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;).&nbsp;&nbsp;If the Participant engages in a Prohibited Activity during the Restr
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	icted Period, the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	or its appropriate S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ubsidiaries may seek an injunction from a court of competent jurisdiction to prevent Participant from engaging in the Prohibited Activity during the Restricted Period without the necessity of posting bond or other security to obtain the injunction.&nbsp;&nbsp;Both the Company and the Participant agree that monetary damages alone are an insufficient remedy for breach of the foregoing covenant.&nbsp;&nbsp;The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Company or its appropriate S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ubsidiaries may seek monetary damages in addition to an injunction, and the covenant in favor of the Company Group in this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	is in addition to, and not in lieu of,
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	6

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">

<TR>
<TD>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	any similar covenants that Participant may have entered into in favor of any member of the Company Group in any employment or other agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;To the extent that a court of competent jurisdiction rules that the restrictions in the foregoing covenant are too broad, these restrictions shall be interpreted and construed in the broadest possible manner to provide the Company Group the broadest possible protection, including (without limitation) with respect to geographic coverage, activities of the Company Group&#x2019;s businesses and time of applicability of the restrictions.
</FONT>
<A NAME="MRC-20161231XEX10_1214_HTM__REF405886277">

<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>

<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">

</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:UPPERCASE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;;">
	9.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	No Right to Continued Employment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Nothing in this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	shall interfere with or limit in any way the right of the Company or its Subsidiaries to Terminate the Participant&#x2019;s employment, nor confer upon the Participant any right to continuance of employment by the Company or any of its Subsidiaries or continuance of service as a Board member.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>

<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:UPPERCASE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;;">
	10.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Withholding of Taxes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Prior to the delivery to the Participant (or the Participant&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	beneficiary
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	) of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Shares
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	upon the conversion of a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Performance Share Unit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, the Participant (or the Participant&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	beneficiary
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	) shall be required to pay to the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	or any Affiliate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	that employs the Participant)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, and the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(or any Affiliate that employs the Participant)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	shall have the right and is hereby authorized to withhold, any applicable withholding taxes in respect of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Award, or any payment or transfer under, or with respect to,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Award, and to take such other action as may be necessary in the opinion of the Committee to satisfy all obligations for the payment of such withholding taxes.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The Participant may elect to satisfy the withholding requirement, in whole or in part, by having the Company withhold from a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	p
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ayment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	t
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	he number of Shares having a Fair Market Value on the date the withholding is to be determined equal to the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	required
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	withholding amount.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The Participant shall be solely responsible for the payment of all taxes relating to the payment or provision of any amounts or benefits
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	under this Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	19.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Resolution of Disputes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Any dispute or disagreement which may arise under, or as a result of, or in any way relate to, the interpretation, construction or application of this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	shall be determined by the Committee.&nbsp;&nbsp;Any determination made hereunder shall be final, binding and conclusive on the Participant, the Participant&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	beneficiaries,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	heirs, executors, administrators and successors, and the Company and its Subsidiaries for all purposes.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	By accepting the grant pursuant to this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, the Participant confirms that Participant is subject to the policies of Participant&#x2019;s employing company within the Company Group (except as may be specifically modified in an employment agreement), including (without limitation) any policy requiring mandatory arbitration of employment disputes and the grant pursuant to this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	is further consideration of those policies.
