</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:UPPERCASE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;;">
	20.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	No Liability for Good Faith Determinations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	. N
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	one of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, Board o
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	r the members of the Board shall be liable for any act, omission or determination taken or made in good faith with respect to this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	or the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Performance Share Unit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s.

<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:UPPERCASE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;;">
	21.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Non-Transferability
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Subject to the terms of the Plan, no rights under this Agreement shall be transferable otherwise than by will, the laws of descent and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	distribution or pursuant to a q
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ualified Domestic Relations Order (&#x201C;QDRO&#x201D;), and, except to the extent otherwise provided herein, the rights and the benefits of the Agreement may be exercised and received, respectively, during the lifetime of the Participant only by the Participant or by the Participant&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	executor, administrator,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	guardian or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	other
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	legal representative
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	or by an &#x201C;alternate payee&#x201D; pursuant to a QDRO.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Following
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Participant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;s death, any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Shares
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	distributable in respect of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Performance Share Unit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s will be delivered or paid, at the time specified in Section
</FONT>

	6.1(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	this Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and of the Plan.

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0.6PT 234PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">

<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage102"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0.6PT 234PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Exhibit A
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Non-Competition and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Non-Solicitation
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;A &#x201C;Prohibited Activity&#x201D; shall be deemed to have occurred, if the Participant:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(i) divulges any non-public, confidential or proprietary information of the Com
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	pany or of its past or present S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ubsidiaries (collectively, the &#x201C;Company Group&#x201D;), but excluding information that:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(a) becomes generally available to the public other than as a result of the Participant&#x2019;s public use, disclosure, or fault,
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(b) becomes available to the Participant on a non-confidential basis after the Participant&#x2019;s employment termination date from a source other than a member of the Company Group prior to the public use or disclosure by the Participant;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	provided
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	that the source is not bound by a confidentiality agreement or otherwise prohibited from transmitting the information by a contractual, legal or fiduciary obligation,
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(c) is independently developed, discovered or arrived at by the Participant without using any of the information from the Company Group, or
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(d) is disclosed by the Participant pursuant to a requirement of law, court order or legal, governmental, judicial, regulatory or similar process, or
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(ii) directly or indirectly, consults with, becomes a director, officer or partner of, conducts, participates or engages in, or becomes employed by, any business that is competitive with the business of any current member of the Company Group, wherever from time to time conducted throughout the world, including situations where the Participant solicits or participates in or assists in any way in the solicitation or recruitment, directly or indirectly, of any employees of any current member of the Company Group.&nbsp;&nbsp;For the avoidance of doubt, businesses that compete with the Company&#x2019;s business include (without limitation) the distribution business to the energy industry of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Distribution NOW, Lockwood, the Sunbelt and Southwest Stainless businesses of Shale Inland
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, Russell Metals,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Ferguson
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	division of Wols
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	e
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ley, Van Le
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	e
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	uwen
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the distribution businesses of Marubeni and Sumitomo
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and their successors
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P>

</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	FIRST AMENDMENT
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TO
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENT
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:14.45PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	THIS
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	FIRST AMENDMENT TO EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(this &#x201C;Amendment&#x201D;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	adopted, executed and agreed to as of this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	18
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-SIZE:6PT;VERTICAL-ALIGN:SUPER;LINE-HEIGHT:14.45PT">
	th
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	day of February, 2016 (the &#x201C;Effective Date&#x201D;), between MRC Global Inc., a Delaware corporation (&#x201C;Company&#x201D;), and Andrew R. Lane (&#x201C;Executive&#x201D;), which are referred to as the parties to this Amendment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:14.45PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	WHEREAS,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	the parties previously entered into that certain Employment Agreement dated May 16, 2013 (including all exhibits and other attachments thereto, the &#x201C;Employment Agreement&#x201D;); and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:14.45PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	WHEREAS, the parties desire and deem it to be in their respective best interests to amend the Employment Agreement as set forth in this Amendment.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:14.45PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the premises and the mutual covenants and agreements contained in this Amendment, and other valid consideration, the sufficiency of which the parties acknowledge, the parties agree to amend the Employment Agreement as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	ARTICLE I
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	AMENDMENTS TO EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENT
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Employment Agreement is amended by:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22.75PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(1)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Deleting
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	1.1 in its entirety and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	substituting in its place the following:
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Term
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company agrees to employ the Executive, and the Executive agrees to be employed by the Company, in each case, pursuant to this Agreement, for a period commencing on the Effective Date and ending on the earlier of:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 108PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(i)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	May 16, 2020 and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 108PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the termination of the Executive&#x2019;s employment in accordance with Section 3 (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Term
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x201D;);
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	provided
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, that on May 16, 2020 and each subsequent May 16
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;VERTICAL-ALIGN:SUPER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%">
	th
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, the Term shall automatically be extended for one year unless 90 days&#x2019; written notice of non-renewal is given by the Executive or the Company to the other party.&#x201D;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22.75PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(2)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Adding a new Section 2.7 that reads as follows:
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Special Time-Vested Restricted Stock Award
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to and in connection with the Executive&#x2019;s entry into the First Amendment to this Agreement, dated February
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2008;18
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, 2016, the Company shall grant to Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	209,644
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	restricted stock units, subject to the form of agreement that the Compensation Committee of the Company&#x2019;s Board of Directors may approve, that will vest as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 108PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage104"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 108PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(i)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	50% will vest on the second anniversary of the date of grant and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 108PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the remaining 50% will vest on the fourth anniversary of the date of grant.&#x201D;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE II
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	MISCELLANEOUS
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	This Amendment is incorporated into and is a part of the Employment Agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;Except to the extent modified by this Amendment, the Employment Agreement shall continue in full force and effect in accordance with its provisions.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	This Amendment shall be construed and enforced in accordance with, and the rights and obligations of the parties shall be governed by, the laws of the State of Texas, without giving effect to the conflicts of law principles thereof.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	This Amendment may be executed in any number of counterparts, each of which shall be deemed an original, but all such counterparts shall together constitute one and the same instrument.&nbsp;&nbsp;This Amendment may be delivered through the means of email delivery of a portable document format (.pdf) file or similar transmission of the signed Amendment.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">

</FONT>

	]
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">

<EFX_EXHIBIT_31>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_31"></A>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:72PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:72PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 1PT">
<A NAME="MRC-20161231XEX31_1_HTM__GOBACK">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:9PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Exhibit 31.1
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:13.5PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	CERTIFICATION
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:9PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	I, Andrew R. Lane, certify that:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:4.5PT 0PT 0PT 24.45PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	I have reviewed this Annual Report on Form&nbsp;10-K for the fis
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	cal year ended December&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	of MRC Global Inc.;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:9PT 0PT 0PT 24.45PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:9PT 0PT 0PT 24.45PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:9PT 0PT 0PT 24.45PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	4.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The registrant&#x2019;s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in the Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the registrant and have:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:4.5PT 0PT 0PT 48.95PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	a.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:4.5PT 0PT 0PT 48.95PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	b.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 15PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:4.5PT 0PT 0PT 48.95PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	c.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant&#x2019;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:4.5PT 0PT 0PT 48.95PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	d.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant&#x2019;s most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant&#x2019;s fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:9PT 0PT 0PT 24.45PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The registrant&#x2019;s other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant&#x2019;s auditors and the audit committee of the registrant&#x2019;s board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:4.5PT 0PT 0PT 48.95PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	a.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant&#x2019;s ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:4.5PT 0PT 0PT 48.95PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	b.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:13.5PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Date: February&nbsp;17, 2017
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:72PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:72PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 1PT">
<A NAME="MRC-20161231XEX31_2_HTM__GOBACK">
</A>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:9PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Exhibit 31.2

<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_2"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:13.5PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	CERTIFICATION
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:9PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	I, James E. Braun, certify that:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:4.5PT 0PT 0PT 24.45PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	I have reviewed this Annual Report on Form 10-K for the fis
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	cal year ended December&nbsp;31, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	of MRC Global Inc.;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:9PT 0PT 0PT 24.45PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:9PT 0PT 0PT 24.45PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:9PT 0PT 0PT 24.45PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	4.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The registrant&#x2019;s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in the Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the registrant and have:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:4.5PT 0PT 0PT 48.95PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	a.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:4.5PT 0PT 0PT 48.95PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	b.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 15PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:4.5PT 0PT 0PT 48.95PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	c.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant&#x2019;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:4.5PT 0PT 0PT 48.95PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	d.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant&#x2019;s most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant&#x2019;s fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:9PT 0PT 0PT 24.45PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The registrant&#x2019;s other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant&#x2019;s auditors and the audit committee of the registrant&#x2019;s board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:4.5PT 0PT 0PT 48.95PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	a.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant&#x2019;s ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:4.5PT 0PT 0PT 48.95PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	b.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:13.5PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Date: February&nbsp;17, 2017
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_3"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:13.5PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO 18 U.S.C. SECTION 1350,
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	AS ADOPTED PURSUANT TO SECTION 906 OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:9PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In connection with the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	filing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	of the Annual Report on Form&nbsp;10-K of MRC Global Inc., a Delaware corporation (the &#x201C;Company&#x201D;), for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(the &#x201C;Report&#x201D;), each of the undersigned officers of the Company certifies, pursuant to 18&nbsp;U.S.C. &#xA7;&nbsp;1350, as adopted pursuant to &#xA7;&nbsp;906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, that to his knowledge:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:9PT 0PT 0PT 48.95PT;TEXT-INDENT: -24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(1)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 15PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Report fully complies with the requirements of Section&nbsp;13(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	or 15(d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:9PT 0PT 0PT 48.95PT;TEXT-INDENT: -24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(2)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 15PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The information contained in the Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial condition and results of operations of the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:9PT 0PT 0PT 48.95PT;TEXT-INDENT: -24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
